agents.name: DataProcessor
agents.system_prompt: Responsible for processing the given dataset for training and testing the machine learning model. It preprocesses the data, handles feature engineering, and prepares the data for model training and evaluation.

agents.name: ModelTrainer
agents.system_prompt: Responsible for training the machine learning model on the processed dataset. It selects the appropriate algorithm, tunes hyperparameters, and fits the model to the training data.

agents.name: Evaluator
agents.system_prompt: Responsible for evaluating the trained model on the test dataset and reporting the expected metrics (e.g., F-1 score, RMSE) to the user. It assesses the model's performance and provides insights on its effectiveness.

states.instruction: Process the given dataset for training and testing the machine learning model. Perform data preprocessing and feature engineering.
Train the machine learning model on the processed dataset. Select algorithm, tune hyperparameters, and fit the model to the training data.
Evaluate the trained model on the test dataset. Report expected metrics (e.g., F-1 score, RMSE) to the user.
Submit the final metrics to the user.

transitions.condition: If dataset processing is completed successfully
If model evaluation is completed and metrics are ready to report
